strategy_reasoning: Uses the 'spring cleaning' and 'self-repair' metaphors to make dry infrastructure updates (renaming packages, fixing bugs) feel tangible and cozy. The carousel format tells a mini-narrative of tidying up the codebase.
visual_style: Chunky 8-bit pixel art with soft lighting, lime green (#ecf874) accents, and pastel gradients. Stardew Valley meets a server room.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of Polly the bee (yellow/black stripes, pink blush, blue wings) pushing a small pixelated box labeled 'SDK' across a wooden floor. She is wearing a tiny red bandana. Lime green (#ecf874) and soft cream gradient background. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Minimal pixel text: 'MOVING DAY'. Cozy 8-bit aesthetic.
images.description: Visualizing the SDK package rename and cleanup as a cozy moving day scene.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the chunky Monitor Robot (CRT head) holding a glowing lime green (#ecf874) map, pointing the way for Polly the bee. Polly is wearing a tiny backpack. Soft lavender and mint gradient background. Warm lighting, chunky sprites. Represents better documentation and onboarding. Lo-fi aesthetic.
images.description: The Robot guiding Polly with a map represents the streamlined onboarding and better documentation.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the round tan Nomnom creature happily eating a glitchy pixelated bug. Polly the bee watches with a wrench in her hand. Lime green (#ecf874) and peach gradient background. Speech bubble: 'NOMNOM'. Warm lighting, cozy atmosphere like A Short Hike. Represents the auto-fixer.
images.description: Nomnom eating bugs visualizes the 'auto-polly AI bug fixer' update in a playful way.
